title: Random Number Generation Function
description: This function generates a random integer within a specified range defined by the parameters 'low' and 'high', based on a fractional part of the input 'last' multiplied by Ï€ (pi). The function truncates the random value before adding it to 'low' to ensure that the result remains within the specified bounds.
name: RDM2

input.name: last
input.description: An integer input used to generate the random number.

input.name: low
input.description: The lower bound of the range for the random number generation.

input.name: high
input.description: The upper bound of the range for the random number generation.

return_value.description: The generated random integer within the specified range from 'low' to 'high'.
